description: Information about the Amazon Simple Notification Service (SNS) topic that is used to record Firewall Manager SNS logs.

nested_items.name: SnsTopicArn
nested_items.description: The SNS topic that records Firewall Manager activity.

nested_items.name: SnsRoleName
nested_items.description: The IAM role that is used by Firewall Manager to record activity to SNS.
